translations: n.（古代盛油或酒的）双耳陶罐（amphora 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Many Roman pots, in particular amphorae and the fine wares designed for use at tables, could travel hundreds of miles—all over the Mediterranean and also further afield.
sentences.translation: 许多罗马时代的陶罐，尤其是双耳罐和专为餐桌上使用而设计的精美器皿，可以游历数百英里——穿越整个地中海，甚至更远。
